name: GEVO, INC., petitioner, v. BUTAMAX ADVANCED BIOFUELS LLC.
name_abbreviation: Gevo, Inc. v. Butamax Advanced Biofuels LLC.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
GEVO, INC., petitioner,
v.
BUTAMAX ADVANCED BIOFUELS LLC.

opinions.text:
On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit for further consideration in light of Teva Pharmaceuticals USA, Inc. v. Sandoz, Inc.,574 U.S. ----, 135 S.Ct. 831, --- L.Ed.2d ---- (2015).
Justice ALITOtook no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
opinions.author: Justice ALITOtook no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

casebody.head_matter:
GEVO, INC., petitioner,
v.
BUTAMAX ADVANCED BIOFUELS LLC.
No. 13-1286.
Supreme Court of the United States
Jan. 26, 2015.
Opinion
